attributes.action: The UK Public just donated £23million to the NHS, can the Government match this?
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the UK general public gathering together to support Captain Tom and his 100 laps around his garden on his 100th Birthday to raise money for the NHS.
The general public already pay our taxes that go towards our beloved NHS. Please now pay your part.
attributes.background: This petition has been set up to ask the Government to play its part and take responsibility for the NHS and match the publics own donation of £23 million.
